wasarak thula wyawasayakayan lakshayak bihi kirime aramunen kriyathmaka entarprayis shri lanka rajaye poli sahana naya yojana kramaya thawa duratath pulul karamin aluthen naya yojana krama atak sandaha da mulya pahasukam laba dimata rajaya thiranaya karayi. 2019 ayawaya yatathe yojitha mema naya yojana krama pulul kirima sandaha mudal amathya mangala samarawira mahatha idiripath kala sandeshayata amathya mandalaye anumathiya labi atha.
